short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GNU Terry Pratchett. Show user when 'Clacks-Overhead' appears in HTTP headers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a tribute to the late Terry Pratchett (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terry_Pratchett). It displays an icon when the user visits a website sending a "Clacks Overhead" message. If the user clicks on the icon, it will display the message and animated clacks semaphore code.

More information can be found here: http://www.gnuterrypratchett.com/

Notes: 
1. This extension does not collect any data or send any information anywhere.
2. All code is open source on Github: https://github.com/newfolder0/chrome-clacks

Contributors:
